divs: Sighting DetailsWell My 21yr old son his Girlfriend and I were in the swimming pool and he said look a UFO I looked up and said thats a baloon he said naw its a UFO I looked at it it was round and huge I said its shinning he said Dad I wish I had my Camrea and then I heard this loud noise from the north and it took off so fast it was gone and then 4 F16 fighter jet were heading in the same direction and my son and I were like wow! It looked as if they were in pursuit of it. Thats it Also on the fourth of July my wife and I were out on the deck and we saw this huge light in the sky it just sat their and then it slowly faded out. I dont know what it was I know it was not a plane.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around June 27th 2009
